verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All praise to Him who reigns above In majesty supreme, Who gave His Son for man to die, That He might man redeem!

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Blessèd be the name, blessèd be the name, Blessèd be the name of the Lord; Blessèd be the name, blessèd be the name, Blessèd be the name of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: His name above all names shall stand, Exalted more and more, At God the Father’s own right hand, Where angel hosts adore.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Redeemer, Savior, Friend of man Once ruined by the fall, Thou hast devised salvation’s plan, For Thou hast died for all.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: His name shall be the Counselor, The mighty Prince of Peace, Of all earth’s kingdoms Conqueror, Whose reign shall never cease.
